snippet.title: Greed for Glory: Build Your Legend!
snippet.description:
Play for FREE on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.perblue.greedforglory.dc 

Greed for Glory is a brilliant city defense game that combines strategic building with fast-paced, epic battles. Join a kingdom and battle other players while leading a mighty army of knights, elves, wizards, dragons, and other fantasy creatures in tactical online wars.

***** "Fun kingdom building game. Build your own kingdom, join alliances with your friends and raid others kingdoms. What more can you ask for"
***** "Brilliant. Very good game. Lots of fun and exciting to play"
***** "Excellent. Best defense game around."
